html: Beasts. Hebrew tsiim, "fishermen."— Serpents. Hebrew ochim. Septuagint, "echo," (Haydock) or "reeds." Babylon was built on a marshy situation, and Cyrus having let out the waters of the Euphrates, they could never be effectually stopped.— Ostriches. Or swans.— Hairy. Goats, chap. xxxiv. 14. (Calmet)
